AppFunctionAppMetadata.appfn:description: A suite of integrated tools provides granular control over the vehicle functions. It allows for monitoring vital information, such as fuel level and ambient temperature, or modifying the state of climate controls, lights, and doors. Use a single command for simple tasks, or chain them together to handle complex requests, like prepping the car for a morning drive.
AppFunctionAppMetadata.appfn:displayDescription: Empowers AI agents to understand and control vehicle functions.
